name: CharMimir V2 (Direct)
description: Chart-to-code generation benchmark where models reproduce source charts by emitting plotting code directly.

metrics.name: execution_accuracy
metrics.definition: Percentage of generated programs that compile and visually match the ground-truth chart

test_method: Generate plotting code (e.g., Matplotlib) from chart screenshots, execute it, and compare rendered images using SSIM/LPIPS.
notes: Record runtime environment (Python version, Matplotlib backend). Some charts require seeded randomness for reproducibility.
